page.title: 13FAMILY LIFE
page.content: Typical Family Monday in Ratho Station All the kids off to school.Mums looking after babies and toddlers. Mums off to the shops.Dads off to work on local industrial sites in Edinburgh.Older brothers and sisters off to work or off to the job centre in Broxburn or Wester Hailes. Babies playing with toys and older brother or sister.Toddlers off to playgroup.At lunch time kids coming home. Lollipop lady counts how many cross.13 going home,22 packed lunches and 30 staying for school dinner.10 absent.At 1.15 the teacher comes out and the children go in for afternoon school.Mums off to meetings in the Community Wing.Babies having a sleep.At 2.45 the small children go home to do homework.At 3.15 other children go home and do homework.After school homework is finished children go out to play while
